Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES

Title: Provides for support and services for unaccompanied minors with no lawful immigration status
Summary: Provides for supports and services for unaccompanied minors with no lawful immigration status including legal representation.
LawCode: Amd §2, add Art 5 Title 12-A §§370-c & 370-d, §§394, 374-g & 393, Soc Serv L; amd §94-b, add §94-d, Exec L; amd §§2511 & 2510, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, the executive law, and the public health law, in relation to providing for supports and services for unaccompanied minors with no lawful immigration status
